title: @Vesh Soraka update Thank you & "WISH"
body:
I want to thank you for making the rework.I only read and saw Sorakas rework,but i must say it looks amazing.
It has alot of decision making,is inetersting and has skillshoots(FINNALY).If we ever hear that you will be working on a champion desing/rework,we will know that we can expect great results.
Again,THANK YOU.

WISH: Could make the Divine Soraka Q colored blue/silver?Wenn ever i see the stars in the background of the Divine splash,i think why doesnt her *Starcall* ability color match with it?
The skin costs 975RP,with really now new animations,reocloring.I dont really know if you can influance that part,but this is a change i would like to see.Thank you for your time.

replies.body: I still really wish the area to heal people on her W was a bit larger.
Do you mean the range on her W or the animation?
Range. Its hard to walk and try to heal people. I'd have to stop and it feels just a TAD unreasonable at times in a team fight. Still trying to find a way to deal with it.

Her heal is unnecessarily constrained: the cost is too high. The range is low, has longer CD, mana cost, AND health cost.
Having to recall more is not fun or interesting.

Her starcall heals her for a pitiful amount.

Heal on loger CD?
I dont reallly have the problem %Hp cost(only on aram).Its a fair trade for how much  u can heal someone to full HP very fast.


If she could heal herself more than now.That would be a major problem.Having a healer which can heal others and him/her-self to full HP in matter of sec would be toxic and unfun for the enemy team.
If Divine Soraka's abilities were tinted blue, I'd buy the skin immediately. I got Celestine because the new particles and effects were beautiful, so I would definitely appreciate more of that.

Well you came a little late to the discussion,but still thanks for the reply.


I only wanted the Q to get blueish to match the stars&nighstsky in her Divine splash,also i made this thread on EUNE forums,got 2 reds from RiotMoonLeaf still bumbing and hoping for a red from someone in the animation/champion department.   :))

Yeah, sorry, I didn't realise this was so old!

Thanks for the update, let's hope this happens some day!
That or the more likely scenario would be that they just decrease the prize.Its easier than to recolor her Q.Sadly but true. :/
